title: DrBeer
author: DrBeer
content: I would like to wish everyone a Happy New Year!May the new year 2023 bring peace, success, prosperity to the whole world!To everyone who supported Ukraine - a separate big thanks, a huge thank you! May your kindness and help us return to you many times over!Today, December 31, the bastard regime of the Kremlin launched another missile attack on the peaceful cities of Ukraine. No, not at military facilities, not even at infrastructure facilities. This time in Kyiv, rockets flew INTO RESIDENTIAL QUARTERS! One rocket hit in Kyiv hit near the school. One rocket hit a residential building. 1.5 kilometers from the place where I live, a Russian rocket fell, which simply did not reach its target ...These were not downed missiles, these were their GOALS - residential buildings, schools, hospitals .... In Kiev, 1 person died, 11 were seriously injured.I believe in the victory of reason, civilization. And I really wish the destruction of rashism - this vile, vile, cowardly regime and its henchmen!Ukraine and the entire adequate world are obliged to defeat rashism and their terrorism in 2023!I wish that in all countries, there will be peace, prosperity in families, the restoration of the economy of your countries, and the opportunity to live in peace and enjoy life without hearing air raid warnings every day and without watching cruise missile explosions in neighboring houses!Happy New Year !!!

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: What's "rashism"?  Is that a new thing?But yeah, happy new year to you and the rest of the forum as well.  Not exactly sure you should have inserted a sensitive political commentary if all you wanted to do was wish everyone well in 2023, but it's obviously an issue that's very near to your heart and I understand that.  It's been a ugly, nasty, shitty last two years at least and I'm really hoping some of the big issues facing the world get at least partially resolved (or at the very least that things don't get worse).  That includes the Russia vs. Ukraine war, the state of the economy, and every other fucking nightmare right down to the price of bitcoin maintaining its dismal valuation for so long.Cheers to all y'all!  I raise my glass to the forum and propose a toast to better days for all of us.

comments.author: jcojci
comments.body: Happy New Year 2023 from Indonesia to Bitcointalk friends who have already celebrated it.There are many hopes that we want to make true this year and hopefully all the dreams we have made in the past year can really come true. Amin.And for the people in Ukraine, I hope they can survive until the war is over and peace comes again and hopefully it will happen in this new year.May all countries be in peace, prosperity, and health and get all the good things in our lives.And hopefully there will be less war and more peace in this world.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Happy New year from Finland and Slava Ukraine OP. I have a terrible flu so i'll be celebrating my new year by looking fireworks behind the window, drinking hot chocolate with whip cream, gambling some, and browsing internet, while playing far cry 6 and making sure that my dog doesn't get freaked out by the noise and loud bangs coming from outside. Tonight i'll be leaving those altcoin charts and new nfts alone. My portfolio can survive trough the new year without 24/7 management, least i hope so.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Happy new year guys! This forum would sure have been boring without you all. I'm sorry @o48o for coming down with a terrible flu but at least there's life, even if you don't get to be amongst the partying folks.  Hopefully, we'd get to see a positive turnout for Bitcoin this year.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Am giving a Happy New Year shout from Nigeria to bitcointalk forum members, @ OP don't worry peace will reign I'm Ukraine as the war can not last forever. This year will bring so much joy and peace to the world,we just hope the inflation stops.Bitcoin will regain from his dip soon and everybody here will be happy they could hold on for long, this year will be a victorious year for bitcoin and for us all.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Unfortunately, this new year is not a happy one for Ukrainians because of these heartless attacks. There is no justification for the bombing of residential buildings and others. Ukraine has been strong in resisting all forms of attacks and intimidation but I think it's high time we seek peace. Many lives have been lost and we mush ensure that all these senseless killings come to an end. My heart goes to the people of Ukraine. Hopefully, this year would be a happy one.

comments.author: nara1892
comments.body: Happy New Year 2023 especially to bitcointalk citizens and generally to everyone.We have gone through various things, be it bitter, sweet, sour life in 2022, hopefully in this new year we can be even better than all things. May we live this year in good health, our bodies are healthy, our hearts are healthy, our economy is healthy and whatever it is.I want to emphasize that I hope that what we are afraid of this year, such as a deteriorating economy, will not actually happen, and when it does, I hope that what we have prepared so far can save us from paralysis.

comments.body: A happy new year to you too OP. It’s sad to witness how Russia continues to commit crimes against humanity by shelling residential neighborhoods, schools and even medical health facilities. This shows that Putin is desperate and willing to go all out to break the will and resilience of the Ukrainian people. But the Ukrainians are dogged and despite the odds, are gradually overcoming the tyrant and defending their homeland. comments.author: dezoel
comments.body: Happy new year everyone! May this year be filled with happiness, peace and of course health for everyone and filled with more and more ATH every month, and would have tons of profits for all of us.I somehow believe that 2023 looks like a much better year, no idea why and how but I feel like we lived through the worse and now we are going towards the recovery, we already had 2020 and 2021 pandemic year and 2022 which was start of recovery and at least the pill we took for healing, and in 2023 we will see all the good things come to life, can't say I know for sure or anything but I really hope that it happens and we live a great life this year.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: DrBeer on December 31, 2022, 03:24:08 PMI would like to wish everyone a Happy New Year!May the new year 2023 bring peace, success, prosperity to the whole world!The turn of 2022 to 2023 this time is one of the worst new year's phases I have ever seen, the economy is deteriorating, natural disasters are everywhere, fierce snowstorms, earthquakes everywhere, wars etc., not knowing exactly what will happen in the future to the world economy, getting better or worse.Even so today is already 3 days for 2023, I only have hope that in the future, the economy, digital/crypto currency can be better than the previous year, both in terms of prosperity and so on.My hope is that in the coming 2023, we all have hope and always pray for the best for humanity throughout the world, especially in terms of the currently deteriorating economy that will get better, it is my hope that the people on this earth can be free from all suffering and live happily.Greetings and happy living a new life in 2023.
